title: Ep225 Wrongful Executions
description:
This week, the gals rant about some cases of lazy detective work with lethal consequences. Topics include murky details about a quick shootout, a rapist who exploits power dynamics, and a whole bunch of really terrible ways to die. Pick up a pack of Bent Paddle Brewing's Venture Pilsner, be glad you weren't born in the Middle Ages, and tune in for Wrongful Executions.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
